titles.title: Housing for Older Persons Act of 1994
A bill to amend the Fair Housing Act to modify the exemption from certain familial status discrimination prohibitions granted to housing for older persons, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7962-7963)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/29/1994--Introduced. Housing for Older Persons Act of 1994 - Amends the Fair Housing Act to exempt communities in which at least 80 percent of the residents are age 55 or older from certain familial status discrimination prohibitions. Exempts a person (or real estate agent) from civil monetary penalties for good faith reliance upon such exemption.
